verses.1: Israel mite aw, Topa in hong panpih lo hileh i tuah ding thu thei un.
verses.2: Eite langpangin mite hong kipat ciangin eiteʼ lamah Topa hong pang lo hileh,
verses.3: eiteʼ tungah a hehna uh a kisosuah ciangin amaute in eite a hingin hong nawmvalh khin ding uh hi.
verses.4: Tuikhang in eite hong tai-in, tuihual in hong tum khin dinga,
verses.5: tuipi husiate in hong tuum mang khin ding hi.
verses.6: Amauteʼ suksiat dingin eite a hong pia khia lo Topa in thupha ngah tahen.
verses.7: Thangsiahteʼ thangzak panin vasa a suahtak bangin eite i suakta hi. Thangkhau kibot tat a, eite i suakta khinta hi.
verses.8: Vanlelei a bawl Topaʼ tung panin eite huhna hong pai hi.
